p: Slavutsky and Bertuzzi [ 52] reported that the terpenes present in the oil can interact with starch through weak bonds, such as hydrogen bond, guaranteeing adhesion between these materials. Carboxymethyl cellulose-agar biocomposite film with Satureja hortensise essental oil [ 36] and sodium alginate films with carvacrol microparticles [ 72] presented a greater contact angle, which is attributed to the hydrophobic nature of the added substances.
